nodes.text: Rankwin Fopow was the Prime Oligarch of the Cadinth Oligarchy, speaker for the Mid Rim planet Cadinth in 22 BBY. He, and therefore Cadinth, supported the Galactic Republic during its conflict with a militant secessionist faction. After the death of the planet's Jedi Watchman, Bodis-Ker Vitan, during a pro-Separatist uprising in Cadinth's capital, the Oligarchy retracted its endorsement of the Republic. Fopow later withdrew all statements, instead declaring that the planet was "firmly undecided" between the two groups.

Rankwin Fopow was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 55, that was published in-universe on the ninth day of the third month in 22 BBY. The article that references him, entitled "Cadinth Loyalty Uncertain After Jedi Death," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
